alert.note: Alert for Horry (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 27 at 5:59PM EDT until August 27 at 6:45PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Columbus County in southeastern North Carolina... Northwestern Horry County in northeastern South Carolina... * Until 645 PM EDT. * At 558 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whiteville, and is nearly stationary. Another severe thunderstorm was located in northern Horry County, moving northward at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. * Locations impacted include... Whiteville, Tabor City, Loris, Chadbourn, Bethel, Lake Waccamaw, Hallsboro, Cherry Grove, Nakina, Redbug, Old Dock, Mollie, Sidney, Southeastern Community College, Clarendon, Williams, Bayboro, Allsbrook, Crusoe Island, and Green Sea. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
